description: Strongly support genome editing if is safe, low ethical concern, have a rational and optimistic view of science, with little concern about social risks or environmental impact
Moderate acceptance of genome editing with residual caution, as sufficient scientific evidence, acknowledging socio-ethical concerns, but not interested in cultural or moral implications
Supportive but emphasises moral responsibility, emphasis on ethics,  and expresses significant concern about social risks
See gene editing as wrong or dangerous, reject its use, deeply concerned about human identity risks and view gene editing as a quick fix
